name: part_001
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ4周年LIVE】ちょこから感謝を込めて4周年3ＤLIVE‼【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [XKBbbN7M44E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Secret Class' in a gothic cathedral-like setting.
Transition between songs with a darkened stage and visual effects.
Performance of the song 'ChocoLove' on a vibrant pink stage with on-screen lyrics.

subtitles.original: 去る制服と、揺れる白衣。
subtitles.english: Departing uniform and swaying white coat.

subtitles.original: ふとした言葉も傷つけてしまう。
subtitles.english: Even casual words can end up hurting.

subtitles.original: 失うものが何もない
subtitles.english: Having nothing left to lose

subtitles.original: 無邪気な瞳で苦しめないで。
subtitles.english: Don't make me suffer with those innocent eyes.

subtitles.original: 君のテストに先生さえも
subtitles.english: Even the teacher, for your test,

subtitles.original: 答えられない 言葉に詰まる。
subtitles.english: Can't answer; I'm at a loss for words.

subtitles.original: 「好きだよ」と全部捨てて、
subtitles.english: “I love you,” throwing everything away,

subtitles.original: 抱き寄せてしまいたいのに。
subtitles.english: even though I want to pull you close.

subtitles.original: そんな強い心じゃいられない。
subtitles.english: I can't maintain such a strong heart.

subtitles.original: 私の答えに罰をつけて。
subtitles.english: Put a mark of punishment on my answer.

subtitles.original: これでいい。君のために
subtitles.english: This is fine. For your sake,

subtitles.original: そう決めたのに。
subtitles.english: I had decided that, and yet...

subtitles.original: 去る制服へ、靡く白衣。
subtitles.english: To the departing uniform, the fluttering white coat.

subtitles.original: 思わず君を引き止める。
subtitles.english: I instinctively hold you back.

subtitles.original: 「好きですか」の難題に、
subtitles.english: To the difficult question, “Do you love me?”

subtitles.original: 許されない答案を書いた。
subtitles.english: I wrote an unpardonable answer sheet.

subtitles.original: 君の将来を縛るだけの
subtitles.english: One that only binds your future,

subtitles.original: 独り善がりな、恋の約束。
subtitles.english: a self-satisfied promise of love.

subtitles.original: ただ君の悲しむ顔を、
subtitles.english: I just didn't want to see

subtitles.original: もう見送らなくていいなら。
subtitles.english: your sorrowful face anymore.

subtitles.original: たとえ悪魔と呼ばれてもいい
subtitles.english: Even if I'm called a demon, it's fine

subtitles.original: 甘くとろけるような ひとときをあなたに。
subtitles.english: giving you a sweet, melting moment.

subtitles.original:
ChocoLove
作詞・作曲 Junky
subtitles.english:
ChocoLove
Lyrics/Composition: Junky

subtitles.original: 聞いて会いたいのもっとそばで
subtitles.english: Listen, I want to see you more, closer by

subtitles.original: 少し困るくらいにおねだり
subtitles.english: Asking for just a bit too much

subtitles.original: ねえちゃんと聞いてみて受け取って
subtitles.english: Hey, listen properly and accept it

subtitles.original: 甘くとろけちゃうような時を
subtitles.english: A moment that will make you melt sweetly

subtitles.original: 疲れてる顔していつもたくさん頑張ってるね
subtitles.english: You look tired, you're always working so hard

subtitles.original: もう全て任せて全部食べてあげようか？
subtitles.english: Shall I just take care of everything and eat it all up?

subtitles.original: よそ見なんて嫌だよちゃんとこっち向いていなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I hate it when you look away, you have to face me properly

subtitles.original: 目と目が合うでしょ照れちゃうくらい見つめてね
subtitles.english: Our eyes will meet, right? Stare at me until you're blushing

subtitles.original: ひとつギュフにさせて
subtitles.english: One, let me make you go “gyufu”

subtitles.original: ふたつ見っけってね
subtitles.english: Two, find me, okay?

subtitles.original: 虜にしちゃうよ心拍数急上昇
subtitles.english: I'll captivate you, heart rate rising rapidly

subtitles.original: 好きよ
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: 痛いの痛いの飛んでけ
subtitles.english: Pain, pain, go away

subtitles.original: 不安な顔より笑顔見せて
subtitles.english: Show me a smile rather than a worried face

subtitles.original: ねえちゃんと聞いてみて受け取って
subtitles.english: Hey, listen properly and accept it

subtitles.original: 甘いチョコのような時を
subtitles.english: A moment like sweet chocolate

subtitles.original: ここに痛いの痛いのもう困っちゃう
subtitles.english: The pain is right here, it's so troubling

subtitles.original: 不意打ちにちょこっとときめく
subtitles.english: My heart flutters just a bit from a surprise attack

subtitles.original: 散らしちゃうわよためもっとちょっと
subtitles.english: I'll scatter them about, just a bit more of your “tame”

subtitles.original: 君の声をもっと聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice more

subtitles.original: 不安なんて抱えてらしくないなんて思ってた
subtitles.english: I thought it wasn't like you to be carrying such anxieties

subtitles.original: 全部全部丸ごと包み込んで溶かしてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll wrap it all, every bit, up and melt it for you
